p: For the qualitative measurement of IgM and IgG class antibodies against CHIKV in human serum, an Anti-Chikungunya Virus IgM Human ELISA Kit (ab 177848) and an IgG Human ELISA Kit (ab 177835) from Abcam were used to test all the serum samples according to the manufacturerâ€™s protocols. The results were calculated and interpreted as suggested in the protocol.
